name: ConnectNPC
notes: NPCs do not have nametags. These can be scripted with Attach3DTextLabelToPlayer.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Connect an NPC to the server.

params_body.name: name[]
params_body.description: The name the NPC should connect as. Must follow the same rules as normal player names.

params_body.name: script[]
params_body.description: The NPC script name that is located in the npcmodes folder (without the .amx extension).
